articles.author: Sean Conlon, Pia Singh
articles.title: S&P 500 rises after Trump’s chip tariffs have broad exemptions: Live updates - CNBC
articles.description: The S&P 500 rose on Thursday, led by tech, as President Donald Trump unveiled new chip tariffs that include a broad exemption.
articles.content:
The S&P 500 rose on Thursday, led by tech, as President Donald Trump unveiled new chip tariffs that include a broad exemption.
The broad market index climbed 0.2%, and the Nasdaq Composite trade… [+2604 chars]

articles.title: Trump demands resignation of Intel CEO over China ties - NBC News
articles.description: President Donald Trump demanded that Lip-Bu Tan, CEO of tech firm, Intel resign immediately, saying he is “highly conflicted.”
articles.content:
President Donald Trump on Thursday demanded that the CEO of the tech firm Intel resign immediately, saying he is highly conflicted because of alleged ties to China.
